old_value: {"id":"emoji-roguelike-28n","title":"When connecting to the server, after selecting a class, the help screen should pop up to instruct players on how to play","status":"open","priority":2,"issue_type":"task","owner":"marc.philip.paquette@gmail.com","created_at":"2026-03-01T14:35:00Z","created_by":"Marc Paquette","updated_at":"2026-03-01T14:35:00Z"}

new_value: Added runHelp() call at the top of RunLoop, right after the event reader goroutine starts. New players now see the controls help screen immediately after class selection.
